member.name: IWICBitmapFrameEncode.Commit
member.summary: Commits the frame to the image.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapFrameEncode.GetMetadataQueryWriter
member.summary: Gets the metadata query writer for the encoder frame.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to metadata query writer for the encoder frame.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapFrameEncode.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the frame encoder using the given properties.
member.param: The set of properties to use for initialization.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapFrameEncode.SetColorContexts
member.summary: Sets a given number profiles to the frame.
member.param: The number of profiles to set.
A pointer to an pointer containing the color contexts profiles to set to the frame.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapFrameEncode.SetPalette
member.summary: Sets the for indexed pixel formats.

param.name: pIPalette
param.para: The to use for indexed pixel formats.
The encoder may change the palette to reflect the pixel formats the encoder supports.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapFrameEncode.SetPixelFormat
member.summary: Requests that the encoder use the specified pixel format.
member.param: On input, the requested pixel format GUID. On output, the closest pixel format GUID supported by the encoder; this may be different than the requested format. For a list of pixel format GUIDs, see Native Pixel Formats.

returns.para: Possible return values include the following.

member.name: IWICBitmapFrameEncode.SetResolution
member.summary: Sets the physical resolution of the output image.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapFrameEncode.SetSize
member.summary: Sets the output image dimensions for the frame.
member.param: The width of the output image.
The height of the output image.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapFrameEncode.SetThumbnail
member.summary: Sets the frame thumbnail if supported by the codec.
member.param: The bitmap source to use as the thumbnail.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.
Returns WINCODEC_ERR_UNSUPPORTEDOPERATION if the feature is not supported by the encoder.

member.name: IWICBitmapFrameEncode.WritePixels
member.summary: Copies scan-line data from a caller-supplied buffer to the object.
member.param: The number of lines to encode.
The stride of the image pixels.
The size of the pixel buffer.
A pointer to the pixel buffer.

returns.para: Possible return values include the following.

listheader.description: The value of lineCount is larger than the number of scan lines in the image.

member.name: IWICBitmapFrameEncode.WriteSource
member.param: The size rectangle of the bitmap source.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapFrameEncode
member.summary: Represents an encoder's individual image frames.
